properties.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued February 19 at 2:43PM EST until February 20 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Burlington VT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as
25 degrees below zero.

* WHERE...Essex County in Vermont.

* WHEN...From midnight tonight to 9 AM EST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on
exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Northwest winds between 10 and 15 mph will
combine with temperatures of -5 to -10 degrees to create
dangerous wind chills tonight.
properties.instruction:
Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a
hat, and gloves.

NWSheadline: WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM EST THURSDAY
